attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We the undersigned want all politicians who fraudulently make expense claims to be brought to justice by law and made to repay all monies claimed. Without exception. To also name and shame them to the public including the amounts claimed

rejection.details: The PM cannot instruct the police and CPS in this way.  Anyone can refer a matter to the police for investigation and they have the discretion whether to investigate the matter or not.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
